column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I'm not a huge pizza person (don't eviscerate me)
column2: but I'm already yearning my return to Lou Malnati's. This place gets packed
column3: so get there early. There's a line to put down your name
column4: and another to preorder your pizza (nothing else
column5: the rest you order at your table). It's quite an efficient system
column6: and they text you a link that updates what position you are in line.
